title: Autocomplete - Basic Setup
description: Build a full-stack autocomplete search application with Fastify backend and Vite frontend. Learn REST API architecture, real-time search, and frontend-backend communication.
learningOutcomes: Understand full-stack architecture with separate backend and frontend
Build a REST API endpoint for search functionality
Create a frontend that communicates with a backend API
Implement real-time search with user input
Structure a Vite project with module bundling
skillsFocused: REST API design (GET with query parameters)
Package.json configuration for both frontend and backend

backend.description: Fastify HTTP server with autocomplete search endpoint

frontend.description: Vite-based frontend with autocomplete UI component
